# Preface {.unnumbered}

><b style="color: #1f5679;">TransProPy</b>ï¼šA python package that integrate algorithms and various machine learning approaches to extract features (genes) effective for classification and attribute them accordingly.

To learn more about TransProPy visit <https://github.com/SSSYDYSSS/TransProPy>.
